price: (30) How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him.
arabic: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāḥasratan ʿalā al-ʿibādi mā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
